title: Road Update: Gangtok to Rumtek
content: The road to Rumtek is in excellent condition after recent repairs. Takes about 45 minutes from Gangtok. Best time to visit is early morning for fewer crowds.

comments.comment: Thanks for the update! Also, parking is available near the monastery.

title: Best Photography Spots at Pemayangtse
content: The view from the monastery courtyard during sunrise is spectacular! Remember to ask permission before photographing inside the main hall. The golden hour light on the mountains is incredible.

comments.comment: Great tip! I'd also recommend bringing a wide-angle lens for the architecture shots.

title: Attending Bhumchu Festival - What to Expect
content: Just attended the Bhumchu festival at Tashiding. Arrive early (by 7 AM) as it gets crowded. Dress modestly and be respectful during ceremonies. The energy is incredible!

comments.comment: Thank you! How long does the ceremony usually last?
The main ceremony is about 2-3 hours, but celebrations continue throughout the day.

title: Solo Female Traveler Experience
content: Traveled solo to all three monasteries. Felt completely safe! Locals are incredibly friendly and helpful. Book homestays in advance during festival seasons.
